title: BRIEF-Inchcape To Sell Three Retail Sites In Australia For 63 Mln Stg
text:
BRIEF-Inchcape To Sell Three Retail Sites In Australia For 63 Mln Stg

Stock Markets 43 minutes ago (Sep 11, 2019 16:51)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Inchcape To Sell Three Retail Sites In Australia For 63 Mln Stg Sept 11 (Reuters) - Inchcape PLC : * FURTHER AUSTRALIA RETAIL SITE DISPOSALS FOR £63M * HAS AGREED TO SELL THREE RETAIL SITES IN AUSTRALIA TO SIME DARBY MOTORS * WILL RECEIVE CASH PROCEEDS OF £63M FOR THESE SITES AND THEY HAVE GENERATED £79M OF REVENUE YEAR TO DATE * IMPACT OF DISPOSALS ANNOUNCED TODAY ON 2019 TRADING PROFIT IS EXPECTED TO BE IMMATERIAL

BRIEF-Inchcape To Sell Three Retail Sites In Australia For 63 Mln Stg
description: BRIEF-Inchcape To Sell Three Retail Sites In Australia For 63 Mln Stg
